data.title: Ben Gordon Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Ben Gordon with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Born in London to Jamaican parents, and moved to the U

S

shortly after his birth

Led the Connecticut Huskies to the 2004 NCAA Basketball Championship

Was drafted with the third overall pick in the 2004 NBA Draft by the Chicago Bulls

Named the NBA's 2005 Sixth Man of the Year

He was the first rookie ever to win the award

Represented the U

S

in the 2003 Pan American Games

In 2007, scored over 40 points twice in one week in games that he was not in the starting lineup
